input.sentences: the day spent on the beach was amazing .
the kids all had fun on the edge of the water .
they even learned how to fish .
some of them even caught fish | though they were small .
at the end of the day | everyone had fun .
output.sentences: James, and his daughter Hannah were taking their first trip together to the lake.
Hannah had been counting the days until the trip!
Hanna's grandfather tight Hannah to fish during the trip.
First, Hanna had to learn to put bait on the hook.
In the evening, Hanna told her cousin, Olivia, how much fin she had fishing that day.
